RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRequestsSent.summary: The requestsSent property of the dictionary indicates the total number of {{Glossary("STUN")}} connectivity check requests that have been sent so far on the connection described by this pair of candidates.
RTCIceCandidatePairStatsRequestsSent.value:
An integer value which specifies the number of STUN connectivity requests that have been sent to date on the connection described by this pair of ICE candidates.The reported number of requests does not include retransmissions.
If a request had to be repeated due to network issues, it will be counted multiple times here.
This differs from , which does include retransmissions.
